solution_line_template: To make {fries_needed} fries he will need {fries_needed} / {fries_per_potato} fries per potato = <<{fries_needed}/{fries_per_potato}={potatoes_needed}>>{potatoes_needed} potatoes.
He has {potatoes_on_hand} potatoes - {potatoes_needed} potatoes = <<{potatoes_on_hand}-{potatoes_needed}={leftover_potatoes}>>{leftover_potatoes} leftover potatoes.
